title: The Ranked Emblems
body: Alright, I play all day every day in ranked solo Q. I played a single match today in dynamic Q, and my emblem changed from solo to dynamic. This needs to be fixed, as it does not represent my play style at all.

replies.body: Your ranked emblem can continuously change and update based on the majority of your recent matches.  Unless the _vast majority _of your games are solo, you may receive the dynamic emblem.  We also have a guide on [Ranked Emblem](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) that I hope might help.  Continue to play solo, and your emblem will update in no time!
